feed.title: Please help sanity test: Linux/Windows 0.5.0rc2 binaries

entry.title: Please help sanity test: Linux/Windows 0.5.0rc2 binaries
entry.summary: Gavin Andresen has tagged v0.5.0rc2 with Gitian-built binaries uploaded to https://sourceforge.net/projects/bitcoin/files/Bitcoin/bitcoin-0.5.0/test/. The windows setup.exe is tested in an XP virtual machine and it installs and runs well. The windows zip and the 32/64 bit Linux .tar.gz still need to be sanity-tested. Shasums for the uploads are provided as df994f18b6b715f6e0451b98b55ddd1946f2f353 (bitcoin-0.5.0-win32-setup.exe), bfbad8acae987467976d535e48653ac7e28c6c76 (bitcoin-0.5.0rc2-linux.tar.gz), and fb2cfd2d8ad45269025a4604c679364a934796b4 (bitcoin-0.5.0rc2-win32.zip). However, Mac builds will be delayed due to issues in creating a standalone .app. Shasums of Gavin Andresen's v0.5.0rc2 gitian.zips are also provided.
